rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with natural light and decorative elements reflecting Chettinad heritage. The design incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entrance in an auspicious direction (typically east or north), ensuring a positive flow of energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living space with high ceilings and large windows that face the garden for natural light and ventilation; includes built-in Chettinad-style wooden paneling.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A formal dining space integrated with the living area for communal family gatherings; features a traditional Chettinad aesthetic with subtle motifs and textures.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditional kitchen designed to optimize workflow (Vastu-aligned layout) and includes ample storage along with Chettinad style accents such as hand-carved woodwork.

rooms.name: Meditation/Study
rooms.description: A quiet corner dedicated to meditation or study; positioned in the north-eastern sector for spiritual energy alignment per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room located towards the west to ensure restful sleep and energy balance; includes traditional Chettinad drapes and decor.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The main bedroom with ample space for luxury living; incorporates Vastu-compliant orientation (south-east) and includes a private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom attached to the master bedroom, designed with water features and natural light that adhere to Vastu principles for harmony.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A large arched door facing east to welcome positive energy as per Vastu; integrated with an ornamental gateway inspired by Chettinad designs.

openings.name: Living Room Window
openings.description: Large windows that open to the garden, ensuring abundant natural light and fresh air while maintaining privacy with traditional lattice screens.

openings.name: Kitchen Window
openings.description: Windows designed to enhance ventilation and allow views of the garden; includes Vastu-compliant placement ensuring proper sunlight exposure.

openings.name: Master Bedroom Balcony
openings.description: A private balcony that overlooks the expansive garden, designed to provide a serene outdoor space; aligned with Vastu principles for relaxation.

openings.name: Side Entrance
openings.description: A secondary entrance facilitating access to the rear garden area; designed in keeping with Chettinad style and Vastu guidelines.

note: This design incorporates the essence of Chettinad architecture, blending traditional aesthetics with modern luxury requirements. The layout has been optimized for an irregular plot by situating rooms around a central garden area to maintain symmetry and adherence to Vastu principles.
